result.eng: I was studying hard before the exams.

result.eng: It's hard for children when their parents separate.

result.eng: Our boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.

result.eng: The guards were on high alert.
result.html: bhí na gardaí ar dianairdeallThe guards were on high alert.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na gardaí ar dianairdeallThe guards were on high alert.

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
